description:
Classic heavyweight style with a hood to match, that’s the Ascard Hood Flannel for men. Coming to a cool-weather wardrobe near you.

This wool-blend fabric is cozy on the outside and comfy on the inside thanks to a quilted lining. It’s great on its own, or for layering up with a classic tee.

Plus, now with plenty of that all-important storage space. That’s why you’ll find dual chest pockets with hidden snap closures for extra security, and front side-seam pockets too.
name: Prana Asgard Hooded Flannel Shirt - Mens
